body_html:
In this test case, the data is 5Go, that mean I can load all the dataset on the CPU Memory without any problem. The idea should be to use bigger dataset later.

The CPU is utilization is also cyclic and almost 200% of the 4 core are used but I am reaching the full utilization of the CPU.
body_text:
In this test case, the data is 5Go, that mean I can load all the dataset on the CPU Memory without any problem. The idea should be to use bigger dataset later.
The CPU is utilization is also cyclic and almost 200% of the 4 core are used but I am reaching the full utilization of the CPU.
body:
In this test case, the data is 5Go, that mean I can load all the dataset on the CPU Memory without any problem. The idea should be to use bigger dataset later. 

The CPU is utilization is also cyclic and almost 200% of the 4 core are used but I am reaching the full utilization of the CPU. 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23408564/39178890-2b44bcda-47b3-11e8-9419-94b0432f41af.png)
